name: Tricky Cups!
description:
Do you have what it takes to become the MASTER OF CUPS?

The idea is simple: move the balls from one cup to another until they end up in the goal cup. It’s easier said than done! This game contains endless levels with tricky set up: sometimes there’s one ball, sometimes two balls. Sometimes there are obstacles or slides to help you. The trickiness never ends!

In this hot new game, you need to have a perfect balance of wit and precision: wit to understand in which order and in which direction you need to turn the cups, and precision to rotate, move, and flick them exactly right. It won’t be easy to become a master — are you ready to take on the challenge?

This game is also full of fun perks: when you play you can collect money and unlock new, fun skins — always 100% free of course! We believe true skill should be rewarded, and that’s why you can’t pay to unlock treasures. Only the truly great will be honored with our cool skins!

What are you waiting for? Download today and start your journey to become a master of cups!
